      • getKettleModeAura

        boolean getKettleModeAura()

      • setKettleModeAura

        void setKettleModeAura​(boolean set)
        Parameters:
        set - True if kettle mode is always on regardless of charging/kettleModeCharging (turn kettleModeType on)

      • getKettleModeCharging

        boolean getKettleModeCharging()

      • setKettleModeCharging

        void setKettleModeCharging​(boolean set)
        Parameters:
        set - True if kettle mode is only when charging ki/transforming; (turn kettleModeType on)

      • getKettleModeType

        byte getKettleModeType()

      • setKettleModeType

        void setKettleModeType​(byte type)
        Parameters:
        type - Legal: 0 for off, 1 for only white particles without aura, 2 for both aura and particles

      • setKaiokenSound

        void setKaiokenSound​(java.lang.String soundDirectory)
        Parameters:
        soundDirectory - "customnpcs:auras.kaioken_aura" Set to "nosound" to disable kaioken aura sound, Default is "", which plays "jinryuudragonbc:1610.aurabk".

      • hasColor

        boolean hasColor​(java.lang.String type)

      • setColor

        void setColor​(java.lang.String colorType,
              int color)
        - Individual IAura Color Precedence: 1. IForm's IAura object color followed by IForm's auraColor (Highest) 2. Individual IAura Color 3. IF overrideDBCForm & in DBC Form -> IAura uses DBC Form Colors [SSJ (yellow), Legendary (green), Divine (purple)] 4. Individual IAura's Type Colors [GoD, UI, SSGod] 5. Base Aura Color (Lowest)
        Parameters:
        colorType - Legal types: color1, color2, color3
        color - hexadecimal color to set type to

      • getColor

        int getColor​(java.lang.String colorType)
        - Individual IAura Color Precedence: 1. Form's Aura 2. Individual IAura Color 3. IF overrideDBCForm & in DBC Form > Use DBC Form Colors [SSJ, Shinka, Rose] 4. Individual IAura's Type Colors [GoD, UI, SSGod] 5. Base Aura Color
        Parameters:
        colorType - Legal types: color1, color2, color3
        Returns:
        Decimal color of type

      • hasAlpha

        Parameters:
        type - Legal types: aura, lightning
        alpha - value of alpha/transparency to set type to

      • getSpeed

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed​(float speed)
        Parameters:
        speed - How fast aura should go through its lifecycle in ticks. DBC Default is 40 ticks. The lower, the faster
